# gx-tab-page

A content container for gx-tab items. Must be preceded by a `gx-tab-caption` element containing the tab item caption.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                  | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `selected` | `selected` | This attribute lets you specify if the tab page is selected. | `boolean` | `false` |
